scripts.mobile:build:ios: cd apps/mobile && eas build --platform ios --profile production
scripts.mobile:build:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --platform android --profile production
scripts.mobile:build:all: cd apps/mobile && eas build --platform all --profile production

scripts.mobile:deploy:android: cd apps/mobile && eas build --platform android --profile production && eas submit --platform android
